goals.question: What is the distribution of package sizes in the flare-dependencies dataset?
goals.rationale: This visualization will help us understand the range of package sizes in the dataset and identify any outliers.

goals.question: What is the most common type of dependency in the flare-dependencies dataset?
goals.rationale: This visualization will help us understand the distribution of dependency types and identify any patterns or trends.

goals.question: What is the relationship between package size and number of dependencies in the flare-dependencies dataset?
goals.visualization: Scatter plot of package size vs. number of dependencies
goals.rationale: This visualization will help us understand if there is any correlation between package size and number of dependencies, which could be useful for optimizing package management.

goals.question: What is the distribution of package depths in the flare-dependencies dataset?
goals.rationale: This visualization will help us understand the range of package depths in the dataset and identify any outliers.

goals.question: What is the distribution of package sizes for each type of dependency in the flare-dependencies dataset?
goals.visualization: Box plot of package sizes for each dependency type
goals.rationale: This visualization will help us understand if there are any significant differences in package sizes between different types of dependencies, which could be useful for optimizing package management.

code:
```
import seaborn as sns
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Load data
data = pd.read_json('flare-dependencies.json')

# Plot histogram of package sizes
sns.histplot(data=data, x='size', kde=True, color='blue')
plt.axvline(data['size'].mean(), color='red', linestyle='dashed', linewidth=1, label='Mean')
plt.axvline(data['size'].median(), color='green', linestyle='dashed', linewidth=1, label='Median')
plt.legend()
plt.title('What is the distribution of package sizes in the flare-dependencies dataset?')
plt.xlabel('Package Size')
plt.ylabel('Count')

plt.show()
```

```
import seaborn as sns
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Load data
data = pd.read_json('flare-dependencies.json')

# Count the number of dependencies by type
dependency_counts = data.groupby('type').size().reset_index(name='count')

# Sort the dependency types by count
dependency_counts = dependency_counts.sort_values('count', ascending=False)

# Create a bar chart of dependency types
sns.set_style('whitegrid')
sns.set_palette('husl')
ax = sns.barplot(x='type', y='count', data=dependency_counts)
ax.set(xlabel='Dependency Type', ylabel='Count')

# Add a vertical line for the most common dependency type
most_common = dependency_counts.iloc[0]['count']
ax.axhline(most_common, color='red', linestyle='--', label=f'Most Common: {most_common:.2f}')
ax.legend()

# Set the chart title
plt.title('What is the most common type of dependency in the flare-dependencies dataset?', wrap=True)

# Rotate the x-axis labels for legibility
plt.xticks(rotation=45, ha='right')

# Show the chart
plt.show()
```

```
import seaborn as sns
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

data = pd.read_json('flare-dependencies.json')

sns.set_style("whitegrid")
sns.set_palette("husl")

fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(10, 6))

sns.scatterplot(x='size', y='imports', data=data, ax=ax)

plt.title('What is the relationship between package size and number of dependencies in the flare-dependencies dataset?', wrap=True)

plt.show()
```

```
import seaborn as sns
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Load data
data = pd.read_json('flare-dependencies.json')

# Plot histogram of package depths
sns.histplot(data=data, x='depth', color='blue', kde=True)
plt.axvline(data['depth'].median(), color='red', linestyle='dashed', linewidth=1, label='Median Depth: {:.2f}'.format(data['depth'].median()))
plt.legend()
plt.title('What is the distribution of package depths in the flare-dependencies dataset?')
plt.xlabel('Package Depth')
plt.ylabel('Count')

plt.show()
```

```
import seaborn as sns
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

data = pd.read_json('flare-dependencies.json')

sns.set(style="whitegrid")
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(10, 6))

sns.boxplot(x="type", y="size", data=data, palette="Set3", ax=ax)

plt.title('What is the distribution of package sizes for each type of dependency in the flare-dependencies dataset?', wrap=True)
plt.xlabel('Dependency Type')
plt.ylabel('Package Size')

plt.show()
```
